verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>, when the number <S%G4129><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> was multiplying <S%G4129><s%>, there arose <S%G1096><s%> a murmuring <S%G1112><s%> of the Grecian <S%G1675><s%> Jews against <S%G4314><s%> the Hebrews <S%G1445><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> their <S%G846><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%> were neglected <S%G3865><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the daily <S%G2522><s%> ministration <S%G1248><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> unto them <S%G1161><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> fit <S%G701><s%> that <S%G2641><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> should forsake <S%G2641><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and serve <S%G1247><s%> tables <S%G5132><s%>.

Look ye out <S%G1980><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, from among you <S%G5216><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> men <S%G435><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> good report <S%G3140><s%>, full <S%G4134><s%> of the <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of wisdom <S%G4678><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> we may appoint <S%G2525><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> business <S%G5532><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> will continue stedfastly <S%G4342><s%> in prayer <S%G4335><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in the ministry <S%G1248><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the saying <S%G3056><s%> pleased700, 1799 the whole <S%G3956><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they chose <S%G1586><s%> Stephen <S%G4736><s%>, a man <S%G435><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Prochorus <S%G4402><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Nicanor <S%G3527><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Timon <S%G5096><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Parmenas <S%G3937><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Nicolaus <S%G3532><s%> a proselyte <S%G4339><s%> of Antioch <S%G491><s%>;

whom <S%G3739><s%> they set <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> when they had prayed <S%G4336><s%>, they laid <S%G2007><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> upon them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> increased <S%G837><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> multiplied <S%G4129><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> exceedingly <S%G4970><s%>; and <S%G5037><s%> a <S%G3793><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> company <S%G3793><s%> of the priests <S%G2409><s%> were obedient <S%G5219><s%> to the faith <S%G4102><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Stephen <S%G4736><s%>, full <S%G4134><s%> of grace <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>, wrought <S%G4160><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> wonders <S%G5059><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> there arose <S%G450><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them that were of <S%G1537><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> the synagogue of the Libertines <S%G3032><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the Cyrenians <S%G2956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the Alexandrians <S%G221><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G575><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> of Cilicia <S%G2791><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%>, disputing <S%G4802><s%> with Stephen <S%G4736><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G2480><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> able <S%G2480><s%> to withstand <S%G436><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> by which <S%G3739><s%> he spake <S%G2980><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> they suborned <S%G5260><s%> men <S%G435><s%>, who said <S%G3754><s%>, We have heard <S%G191><s%> him <S%G846><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> blasphemous <S%G989><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> against God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> they stirred up <S%G4787><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> came upon <S%G2186><s%> him <S%G2532><s%>, and seized <S%G4884><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G71><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> the council <S%G4892><s%>,

and <S%G5037><s%> set up <S%G2476><s%> false <S%G5571><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%>, who said <S%G3004><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> ceaseth <S%G3973><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to speak2980, 989 words <S%G4487><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> we have heard <S%G191><s%> him <S%G846><s%> say <S%G3004><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3480><s%> shall destroy <S%G2647><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall change <S%G236><s%> the customs <S%G1485><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G537><s%> that sat <S%G2516><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the council <S%G4892><s%>, fastening <S%G816><s%> their eyes on <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saw <S%G1492><s%> his <S%G846><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> as it had been <S%G5616><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of an angel <S%G32><s%>.
